name: Aegis Wing
description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 2-4, HD (High Definition). Ready to save the universe from an Araxian invasion? Challenge them solo or recruit up to three friends for an all-out assault. Feeling lucky? Try it on Insane mode – the rewards are greater but the name is all too accurate. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
